Package dispatcher

Class DispatcherServiceImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.example.ArrowFabric.DispatcherServiceGrpc.DispatcherServiceImplBase
      • dispatcher.DispatcherServiceImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.grpc.BindableService, java.lang.Runnable
    public class DispatcherServiceImpl
extends org.example.ArrowFabric.DispatcherServiceGrpc.DispatcherServiceImplBase
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Implements services provided by Grpc proto and also heartbeat monitoring of servers.

      • addVectorToRedis

        private boolean addVectorToRedis​(java.lang.String name,
                                 java.lang.String type,
                                 long size,
                                 long numElements,
                                 ServerNode node)
        Adds vector information into redis.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the vector
        type - Type of the vector
        size - Size of vector in Bytes
        numElements - Number of elements inside the vector
        node - Server/Node where the vector will be stored
        Returns:
        True if everything went fine, otherwise false when vector with these parameters is already present

      • getVectorFromRedis

                                   java.lang.String type,
                                   ServerNode node)
        Check if vector is already stored in redis.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the vector
        type - Type of the vector
        node - Server/Node where the vector is stored
        Returns:
        True if vector is present, false otherwise

      • deleteVectorFromRedis

        private boolean deleteVectorFromRedis​(java.lang.String name,
                                      java.lang.String type,
                                      ServerNode node)
        Delete vector information from redis
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the vector
        type - Type of the vector
        node - Server/Node where the vector is stored
        Returns:
        True if vector was found and is removed, false if key was not found

      • addServerToRedis

        private void addServerToRedis​(ServerNode node)

        Parameters:
